comments.comments_text: Robin Gosens (Union Berlin) is the first to get to a rebound inside the penalty area and his weak, but precise effort finds its way into the back of the net, bouncing in off the crossbar.

comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Leonardo Bonucci (Union Berlin) was quite harsh and Srdjan Jovanovic didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: It's in the back of the net! Superb finishing from Sheraldo Becker (Union Berlin). Alex Kral plays a fantastic through ball and finds Sheraldo Becker (Union Berlin), who reacts quickly to get in front of the goalkeeper and fire a close-range shot into the bottom left corner. 1:0.
